name: P27
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated doorbell camera, suburban home front porch at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. A recognized family member, teenager with backpack. They walk confidently to the door, pull out keys, unlock the door, and enter the house. Relaxed body language, familiar with the environment, smooth key insertion. Fixed camera position, wide-angle lens with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 15-second duration.
